name: S3GeneratePresignedURL
description: Generates a presigned URL pointing to the object given. You can provide the endpoint as a bucket/object definition (S3AddACL(bucket:"mybucket",object:"myobject.txt") ) or as a virtual filesystem path (S3AddACL(path:"s3://mybucket/myobject.txt") ).

params.name: bucketNameOrPath
params.description: This can be the bucketname or simple the virtual filesystem point for the file (if object name is no defined)

params.name: objectName
params.description: Name of the object (path) within the bucket of your object to read

params.name: expireDate
params.description: Date time when the URL should expire.

params.name: httpMethod
params.description: The desired HTTP method (e.g., GET, PUT). Defaults to GET.

params.name: sseAlgorithm
params.description: The desired server-side encryption algorithm, valid values are AES256 or KMS.

params.name: checksum
params.description: The base64 encoded MD5 checksum of the object's content.

params.name: type
params.description: The MIME type of the object (e.g., "text/plain").

params.name: disposition
params.description: Specifies presentational information for the object, like "attachment; filename=\"filename.pdf\"".

params.name: encoding
params.description: Specifies content encodings applied to the object, like gzip.

params.name: version
params.description: The version ID of the object if versioning is enabled.

params.name: zeroByte
params.description: A flag to specify if the object has zero-byte content.

params.name: responseHeaders
params.description: Struct of custom response headers for custom metadata prefixed with "x-amz-meta-" (prefix is optional, function will add it if missed).

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: S3 accessKeyId, if not defined it checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.accesskeyid].

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: S3 secretAccessKey, if not defined it checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.secretaccesskey].

params.name: host
params.description: the provider to connect, if not set Amazon AWS is used.
